meanings.definition: Resembling or pertaining to the uvea of the eye.
meanings.sent1: The uveous iris protected the delicate eye structures.
meanings.sent2: Her eyes sparkled with a uveous hue in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The uveous glow of the eye made it look like a mysterious gem.
meanings.sent4: The uveous darkness of her eyes hinted at hidden depths.
meanings.sent5: The uveous color of the eye was mesmerizing to behold.

meanings.sent1: The uveous leaves of the tree rustled in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The old book had uveous pages from years of exposure.
meanings.sent3: The uveous shade of the wood gave the room a cozy feel.
meanings.sent4: The uveous soil in the garden was rich and fertile.
meanings.sent5: The uveous coat of the dog gleamed in the sunlight.
